meanings: beforehand, in advance, ahead of time
let sb know beforehand[ahead of time, in advance]

examples.korean: You can preset the radiators to come on when you need them to. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 필요할 때 난방기가 가동되도록 미리 조정해 놓을 수가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You can preset the radiators to come on when you need them to. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You are advised to pre-book. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 미리 예약하실 것을 권합니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You are advised to pre-book. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Prep the vegetables in advance. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 채소는 미리 준비하라[다듬어 놓아라]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Prep the vegetables in advance. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We sent our furniture on by ship. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 가구를 선편으로 미리 보냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We sent our furniture on by ship. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They kept to the preset route. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 미리 결정했던 루트를 고수했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They kept to the preset route. Add to Wordbook
